description:
Attempting to deal with the unidentified youkai that is attacking them, Gessho uses his pure flame technique but in doing so he seems to awaken something in Suusu, though it only lasts for an instant. His flames, however, consume the hospital with Unhi and Setsuyo still inside. As the end draws near, Setsuyo reflects on her past life as she descends into the flames trying to put together the missing pieces of her memories. As the last puzzle piece falls into place it lookd as though it might be too late for the lovers. Will Unhi and Setsuyo`s love endure into another life time or will they perish in the flames?
Source: crunchyroll
